SQL.text: SELECT MACH,SERIAL,LLI,PERIOD_END_DTE,SERVICE_DTE,DOCNUM,ECA,POSTAL_CDE,COUNTRY_CDE,WW_CDE,CASE WHEN STATUS = 'NEW' THEN 'N' WHEN STATUS = 'RESUBMIT' THEN 'R' END AS RESUBMIT_IND,'88888888' AS LENOVO_KEY,TRANSACTION_ID,CAST(99 AS INTEGER) AS REJECT_CDE FROM LENOVO.BF_BILLABLE_V WHERE (PERIOD_END_DTE IN (SELECT PERIOD_END_DTE FROM LENOVO.PERIOD_DATES WHERE YEAR = YEAR(CURRENT DATE) AND MONTH = MONTH(CURRENT DATE))) AND (mod(cast(reject_id as integer),2) = 1)
